title: 3.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Look at the image given below. Rick is working on a project where he wants the cat to move from left to right on the road. He wants the cat to appear four times from the left after the (green flag) is tapped. What number should he enter in the repeat block?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
